article.title: U.S. Export Assistance Center of San Juan Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Center of San Juan.
article.content:
​

Puerto Rico Office Contact Information

U.S. Department of Commerce

Centro Internacional de Mercadeo Tower II

Suite 702 Street 165

Guaynabo, P.R. 00968-8058

Puerto Rico Staff

Mr. Jose Burgos

USEAC Director

Office: 787-775-1992

Mobile: 787-679-3048​

Fax: 787-781-7178

Email: jose.burgos@trade.gov

Ms. Rachel Duran

International Trade Specialist

Office: 787-775-1974

Mobile: 787-679-3051

Fax: 787-781-7178

Email: rachel.duran@trade.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​
